sentences.sentence: This Sunday the same thing happened. All the dishes were paid by public money just as last week. Then in my mind appeared the scene that several classmates left school be carse of poverty.
sentences.translation: 这个周日发生了相同的事情，像上周一样也是公款消费，我的脑海里浮现出几位同学因贫穷而辍学的情景。

sentences.sentence: As a result, it would carse more serious noiSe and distortion, In order to improve the reception quality, we are asked to make better design of a carrier for its noise ratio and CTB target.
sentences.translation: 为了提高收视质量，对系统设计中的载噪比和复合三次差拍（CTB）指标必然提出更高的要求。
